record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1925. Fifth row A. A. Stagg, Coach; fourth row: T. Eck, C. K. McNeil, F. J. Hobscheid, F. K.Gowdy, J. E. Russell, V. Levine, L. Smith, and N. B. Johnson; third row: A. S. Edler; second row: G. B. Ravenscroft, G. Kernwein, R. B. MacFarlane (captain, winter quarter), H. P. Bourke (captain, spring quarter), J. F. Spence, and S. Webster; first row: S. P. Stackhouse, C. B. McKinney, J. J. Cusack, and F. C. Edler.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
